name: Guru Guru Grove Groove
description:
The first installment of my first game.  Use the Spacebar, arrow keys, mouse clicks, or gamepad buttons to help Beatrice, the head-in-the-clouds golemancer, recharge the golems according to their respective patterns. Currently has 3 possible end screens. I recommend using the downloadable version as the timings on web may be slightly off.

Planned:
  • Volume options
  • Local High Score
  • In-scene score trackers (rather than plain numbers)
  • Proper level ends
  • Proper main menu
  • At least two more scenes featuring the other two witches of Guru Guru Grove
possible features:
  • Calibration (perhaps especially for web)
  • User song support

Be sure to follow here on itch or my twitter for the latest updates, and my twitch where I work in 3D, and inevitably on Guru Guru Grove Groove's Gals.
